articles.title: French writer Annie Ernaux awarded Nobel Prize in literature - The Associated Press
articles.description: PARIS (AP) — French author Annie Ernaux won this year’s Nobel Prize in literature Thursday for blending fiction and autobiography in books that fearlessly mine her experiences as a working-class woman to explore life in France since the 1940s.

articles.title: Hilary Swank Is Pregnant With Twins - The Cut
articles.description: Two-time Oscar winner Hilary Swank and her entrepreneur husband, Paul Schneider, are expecting twins, the ‘Million Dollar Baby’ star announced during a ‘Good Morning America’ appearance Wednesday. Swank says the babies are due in April.
